title: Russia's 40-mile convoy appears to have bogged down 15 miles from Kyiv; shells pound Ukrainian city of Kharkiv. Live updates.
content:
1. Russia's 40-mile convoy appears to have bogged down 15 miles from Kyiv; shells pound Ukrainian city of Kharkiv. Live updates.  USA TODAY
  2. Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
  3. Russian forces escalate attacks on Ukraine's civilian areas  The Associated Press - en Español
  4. Kharkiv surrounded by Russian troops; Zelenskyy calls out Russian "state terrorism" | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
  5. Tuesday briefing: Russian convoy bears down on Kyiv  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Russia's 40-mile convoy appears to have bogged down 15 miles from Kyiv; shells pound Ukrainian city of Kharkiv. Live updates.  USA TODAY

localize.title: ロシアの40マイル輸送船団はキエフから15マイルで停滞し、砲弾はウクライナの都市ハリコフを攻撃したようだ。ライブアップデート。
俄罗斯40英里的车队似乎在距离基辅15英里处陷入困境；炮弹袭击了乌克兰城市哈尔科夫。实时更新。
俄羅斯40英里的車隊似乎在距離基輔15英里處陷入困境；炮彈襲擊了烏克蘭城市哈爾科夫。實時更新。
